text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased API and Build error rates in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We have identified the cause of the increased error rates for the CodeBuild Management Console and Build APIs in the US-EAST-1 Region and continue to work towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 8:35 AM and 10:05 AM PDT we experienced increased error rates for the CodeBuild Management Console and Build APIs in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
